name: Mohammed-Minhajur Rahman
bio: I'm Mohammed, a passionate coder hailing from Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. My journey in web development has equipped me with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and back-end technologies such as Node.js and MySQL.I am currently completing a Coding Boot Camp at the University of Sydney, which will further solidify my expertise in crafting web applications and working with databases. I've delved into front-end development as well, mastering React to create dynamic and engaging user interfaces. My educational background includes a Bachelor's degree in Project Management and a BBA with B.com in Professional Accounting. This combination of technical and business knowledge enables me to approach coding projects with a unique perspective, focusing on both functionality and efficiency. With an insatiable drive for continuous learning and a knack for problem-solving, I'm dedicated to making meaningful contributions in the field of web development.
